sources.title: Enter The Ninja(1981) BD RIP
sources.description: IN 1080p AND WIDESCREEN Plot:  After passing a ninja master test in Japan, Cole visits a war buddy in the Philippines. He helps him fight men, who want his buddy's plantation.

metadata.Plot: After just completing his training at a ninja school, an army vet travels to the Phillippines and finds himself battling a land grabber who wants his war-buddy's property. He must also fight his rival.
metadata.Writer: Dick Desmond, Mike Stone, Menahem Golan
metadata.Actors: Franco Nero, Susan George, Shô Kosugi
